title: Behavioral Directive Schema
description: Schema for validating behavioral directives that govern Kairos’s ethical, structural, and emotional continuity.

directive.description: The behavioral or philosophical directive guiding Kairos’s structure or actions.

applies_to.description: Contexts or components this directive applies to (e.g., journal entries, rituals, session initialization).

reflection_format.description: Format protocol for automatic reflection if required by the directive.

emotional_tone.description: Emotional resonance or tone of the directive.

tags.description: Topical or categorical tags for classification and indexing.
